transArray.content: I have stayed in this hotel several times. I didn’t find a window at the first time. I thought it was windowless. Later, I found a switch. It’s very smart, but there is only a bathrobe in the room, and there is only a layer of cloth between the toilet and the bathroom. Oops, It's not so good, splashing water, everything else is good, the hotel facilities are smart and suitable for young couples
